remarks: The extended nonnegative real numbers form a semiring left module.  One could also have used ` subringAlg ` to get the same structure. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 6-Sep-2018.)
statement:
xrge0slmod.1 $e |- G = ( RR*s |`s ( 0 [,] +oo ) ) $.
xrge0slmod.2 $e |- W = ( G |`v ( 0 [,) +oo ) ) $.
xrge0slmod $p |- W e. SLMod $.
